name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior JavaScript Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, adept in **JavaScript**, **Node.js**, **REST**, **SOAP**, and proficient in **SQL**, including **SQLite** and **PostgreSQL**. Expertise in building scalable solutions using **AWS Lambda**, **API Gateway**, and the **Serverless Framework**. Skilled in automated testing methodologies, ensuring robust and reliable applications.
Strong problem-solving abilities and excellent communication skills enhance collaboration within teams and with stakeholders. Additionally, well-versed in both frontend and backend development with a solid foundation in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven experience in implementing AI/ML-powered platforms and deploying cloud-native systems, aligning with compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
